body.name: L.O.L. Surprise! Magic Flyers: Sky Starling- Hand Guided Flying Doll, Collectible Doll, Touch Bottle Unboxing, Great Gift for Girls Age 6+

features: Three NEW LOL Tot Characters with unique designs, and fashionably designed wings that really fly!
MAGIC BOTTLE UNBOXING: A mysterious, magical bottle that shakes, rocks, and lights up when you touch it!
HAND GUIDED: Simply hold your hand underneath Sky Starling’s feet to guide her as high as you can!
UNBOX AGAIN AND AGAIN: Repeat the whole unboxing over and over, or switch the bottle to launch Sky Starling right away!
RECHARGABLE: Each Magic Flyer comes with batteries in the bottle and a USB charger to recharge your flyer for endless fun!
COLLECT THEM ALL: Collect all 3 Magic Flyer L.O.L. Surprise Dolls!
body.description: A mysterious bottle. Flashes of light. It shakes. It rocks. It comes to life! Flitter, flutter, fashion wings! Meet the Magic Flyers who magically fly and make a scene! Introducing L.O.L. Surprise Magic Flyers! Meet three new LOL Tots with fashion wings who really fly! Each L.O.L. Surprise Magic Flyer doll comes in a unique plastic bottle that comes to life when you touch or rub it. Touch the bottle once and it shakes, touch it twice and it lights up in an amazing rainbow, touch it three times and the bottle magically opens, then pull the lid back and your magic flying Tot flies into the air. While your Magic Flyer is in the air you can guide it with your hand, keeping it from touching the ground. It’s an unboxing experience like never before! Meet Flutter Star, Sweetie Fly, and Sky Starling, three new LOL characters who have magic flying ability. Every doll comes fashionably styled with unique wings and the ability to fly! Each Magic Flyer comes with batteries and a USB cord to recharge your bottle and flying Tot. Collect all 3 Magic Flyers and watch them flitter, flutter, and make a scene! LOL Surprise collectible dolls with stylish hair, fun to dress outfits and many detailed accessory pieces make a perfect toy and playset for kids including 3- to 7-year-olds and up girls and boys for imaginative pretend play! As birthday gifts and gift for any special occasion, dolls provide hours of social play with siblings and friends! From MGA Entertainment, creators of LOL Surprise fashion and collectible dolls, Rainbow High fashion dolls, Na Na Na Surprise dolls, Bratz fashion dolls, MGA's Dream Ella fashion dolls, MGA's Glitter Babyz baby dolls, Lalaloopsy, Poopsie Surprise girls dolls, Baby Born Surprise Baby Dolls and Collectibles, Little Tikes kids toys and many other favorite brands.

Magic Bottle Unboxing! Each L.O.L. Surprise Magic Flyer doll comes in a unique plastic bottle that comes to life when you touch or rub it. Touch the bottle once and it shakes, touch it twice and it lights up in an amazing rainbow, touch it three times and the bottle magically opens, then pull the lid back and your magic flying Tot flies into the air.

Collect Them All! Meet Flutter Star, Sweetie Fly, and Sky Starling, three new LOL characters who have magic flying ability. Every doll comes fashionably styled with unique wings and the ability to fly! Each Magic Flyer comes with batteries and a USB cord to recharge your bottle and flying Tot. Collect all 3 Magic Flyers and watch them flitter, flutter, and make a scene!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds Charge - Super Fast - Great Quality - Tons of FUN!!!!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I got this for my daughter after she saw an add on youtube. This was her birthday gift and let me tell you. My 9 year old has loved this toy since she got it in December.The casing was easy to open and provided a magical experience for my daughter when she knocked on it so the fairy would come out. She couldn't stop showing everyone what she could do. It was easy to reload the doll back into the case to keep knocking and having the fairy appear.The doll itself is great! She flies perfectly and as high as you want (sometimes a little too high if your an adult playing with the toy jaja) but easy to control and great fun for everyone involved. The doll also has a button you can push on it (small black button) to be able to use without the case if you wanted to continue playing without having to knock on the case itself. Just place the doll in the case without closing it, gently press the doll against the back, the little black button will get pressed and there you go. Let the good times continue!Overall this was a perfect gift that had both kids and adults wanting to continue playing. I love this product because as an adult you want to find things you and your child can play with and this is one of those things! Gets everyone up and moving and its so exciting watching the little fairy actually fly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: My three year old bought this with her Christmas money and I had my doubts. It was a decent price and it has lasted way longer than I anticipated. It's a pretty cool little toy. It charges fast and lasts long enough. I'd definitely recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Little doll really flies
reviews.reviewText: Got this little doll for my granddaughter for Christmas and it was a hit! She said it was her favorite gift. Doll is easy to keep flying simply by gently bumping her feet with the palm of your hand. Lots of fun.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better than expected!
reviews.reviewText: Not only did my granddaughter love it so did all the adults who got to teach her how to use it. Super cute and cool watch as the kids played with it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to charge and use
reviews.reviewText: My 8 year old daughter loves this! Such a fun toy that’s different from so many she already has! Easy to charge and use. She likes putting her hand under the doll while it’s in the air and it moves in the direction of her movement. Fun!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lots of fun!
reviews.reviewText: I didn't realize how fun this little toy would be! Even my husband enjoys it! It is super easy for my 5 yr old to work, even my 2 yr old knows how to make it work. We have high ceilings so she can really fly. If you hold your hand under her she will fly higher! "Santa" really impressed this year!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a delight
reviews.reviewText: My granddaughters ages 7 & 8 each received one for Christmas. The giggles made this delightful to watch as they played with the fairies. The case is adorable and holds the cord to recharge the fairies. When done playing with the fairies, they fit into the case to store.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars My daughter loves it!
reviews.reviewText: This is a neat little toy! My 5-7 year olds love it. It can be dangerous around babies though.After playing with it for a couple weeks it seems that the sensor on the bottom that makes it go up and down is no longer working.
My niece really enjoyed this for her birthday and I honestly did too. The “fairy” thing comes out and fly’s around before returning. Entertaining to watch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm not sure who enjoyed this toy the most: the 4 year old recipient or her parents. The doll certainly flies when freed from the case and flies higher or lower when avoiding capture. As a bonus it has a rechargeable battery and comes with a lead. It's too early to say how sturdy the winged flying doll is although it looks delicate.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Hours of fun and giggles. Just beware if your daughter hangs her head near the impeller there is a chance it will tangle in her hair! We’ve experienced this! Lucky I managed to untangle and not need the hair dresser for help! Be warned. Keep long hair away when it’s flying
